dict.acceptation: 解释；说明；辩解；（消除误会后）和解；

sent.orig: I had doubts, but your explanation satisfies me ( I am satisfied with your explanation) .
sent.trans: 你的解释消除了我的疑虑（我对你的解释感到满意）。

sent.orig: Teacher the explanation from museum after saw surprisingly, fortunately explanation member have not see.
sent.trans: 老师从博物馆的解说员身后惊奇地看见了，幸好解说员尚未看到。

sent.orig: Many others might give an explanation very much like above. But this explanation is wrong.
sent.trans: 许多人可能作出和你非常相似的解释，但这个解释是错误的。

sent.orig: I'm not satisfied with his circular explanation.
sent.trans: 我不满意他拐弯抹角的解释。

sent.orig: Sometimes there's simply a very logical explanation to why something is like it is.
sent.trans: 有时要注脚事为什么这个样子总是有很简略单纯的逻辑。
